additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: WATER, SUGAR, 25% RECONSTITUTED PRINK GRAPEFRUIT JUICE, ACID (CITRIC), NATURAL FLAVOURS, NATURAL COLOUR (FRUIT EXTRACTS), VEGETABLE GUM (XANTHAN), PRESERVATIVES (202,223).

additionalProperty.name: Country Of Origin
additionalProperty.value: Made in Australia using Australian & imported ingredients

description: For pure refreshment, our Pink Grapefruit Cordial celebrates the distinctively citrus flavour of this blushing fruit. Enjoy this careful blend of tangy grapefruit juice with just the right amount of sweetness.
name: Pink Grapefruit Cordial
